document.full_text: the knicks' postseason has produced powerful doses of exhilaration and anguish amid two heartbreaking defeats, raising questions as to where the knicks are headed.
document.title: on basketball: knicks-celtics a first-rate drama, with second-guesses
lines_and_colors: the knicks' postseason has produced powerful doses of exhilaration and anguish amid two heartbreaking defeats, raising questions as to where the knicks are headed.
